fields.name: Shaker, 37C
fields.description: Incubator with shaking capability for E. coli growth

fields.name: Fluorescence Plate Reader
fields.description: Instrument for measuring fluorescence in microplates

fields.name: Shaker, 26C
fields.description: Incubator with shaking capability for insect cell growth

fields.name: Ultracentrifuge
fields.description: High-speed centrifuge for separation of cell membranes

fields.name: Krios Cryo TEM
fields.description: Cryo Transmission Electron Microscope for low-resolution sample testing

fields.name: Titan Krios Cryo TEM
fields.description: High-energy Cryo Transmission Electron Microscope for high-resolution data collection

fields.name: Liquid Ethane Cryo-Plunge
fields.description: Liquid nitrogen-cooled liquid ethane vessel and robotic plunger for freezing EM grids for data collection

fields.name: X-ray diffractometer
fields.description: Focused X-ray beam and rotating sample stand used to collect preliminary data on protein crystals and screen samples prior to full data collection at off-site synchrotron

fields.name: Electron detector
fields.description: Reusable electron detection screen used in combination with X-ray diffractometer for preliminary data collection
